amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to conduct certain offshore natural gas preleasing, leasing and related activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to conduct activities in violation of the moratorium on drilling in the Outer Continental Shelf.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Putnam amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 203 (Roll no. 170).
